languages.text: "Вы заставили нас изрядно понервничать в последние часы". {n}Абеляр сухо улыбается.{/n} "Впрочем, после того, как вы бесстрашно {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}кинулись в огонь{/d} на палубе, я удивляюсь только тому, сколько вы продержались на ногах: силы оставили вас только тогда, когда все было позади. Похвальная стойкость для Лорд-капитана!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы заставили нас изрядно понервничать в последние часы". {n}Абеляр сухо улыбается.{/n} "Впрочем, после того, как вы бесстрашно кинулись в огонь на палубе, я удивляюсь только тому, сколько вы продержались на ногах: силы оставили вас только тогда, когда все было позади. Похвальная стойкость для Лорд-капитана!"

languages.text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}rush into the fray{/d} on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "Вы заставили нас изрядно понервничать в последние часы". {n}Абеляр сухо улыбается.{/n} "Впрочем, после того, как вы бесстрашно {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}кинулись в огонь{/d} на палубе, я удивляюсь только тому, сколько вы продержались на ногах: силы оставили вас только тогда, когда все было позади. Похвальная стойкость для Лорд-капитана!"

traits.locale_text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly rush into the fray on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

"You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly rush into the fray on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

"You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly rush into the fray on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

"You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly rush into the fray on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

languages.text: “您让我们担心了好几个小时。”{n}阿贝拉德对你露出了淡淡的微笑。{/n}“不过，您{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}勇敢地加入了甲板上的战斗{/d}之后，竟然坚持了那么久，这让我惊讶不已。直到战斗结束之后，您才筋疲力尽地倒在地上。领主舰长能拥有这样的毅力，真的极为令人钦佩！”
languages.original_text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}rush into the fray{/d} on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: “您让我们担心了好几个小时。”{n}阿贝拉德对你露出了淡淡的微笑。{/n}“不过，您勇敢地加入了甲板上的战斗之后，竟然坚持了那么久，这让我惊讶不已。直到战斗结束之后，您才筋疲力尽地倒在地上。领主舰长能拥有这样的毅力，真的极为令人钦佩！”

languages.text: 「数時間ほど、心配させられました」{n}アベラルドは薄く微笑む。{/n}「しかし、あなたが甲板で{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}大胆に戦いに突入{/d}するのを目撃した後、唯一驚いたのは、あなたがどれほど長く持ちこたえられたかということです。そのような不屈の精神は、ロード・キャプテンとして最も称賛に値するものです！」
languages.original_text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}rush into the fray{/d} on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: 「数時間ほど、心配させられました」{n}アベラードは薄く微笑む。{/n}「しかし、あなたが甲板で大胆に戦いに突入するのを目撃した後、唯一驚いたのは、あなたがどれほど長く持ちこたえられたかということです。そのような不屈の精神は、ロード・キャプテンとして最も称賛に値するものです！」

languages.text: "Ihr habt uns einige Stunden lang ganz schöne Sorgen gemacht." {n}Abelard lächelt schmallippig.{/n} "Aber so wir Ihr Euch auf Deck furchtlos {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}in den Kampf gestürzt habt{/d}, überrascht mich eigentlich nur, wie lange Ihr auf den Beinen geblieben seid: Eure Kraft hat Euch erst verlassen, als das Gefecht vorüber war. Derlei Stärke bei einem Lord Captain ist überaus lobenswert!"
languages.original_text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}rush into the fray{/d} on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt uns einige Stunden lang ganz schöne Sorgen gemacht." {n}Abelard lächelt schmallippig.{/n} "Aber so wir Ihr Euch auf Deck furchtlos in den Kampf gestürzt habt, überrascht mich eigentlich nur, wie lange Ihr auf den Beinen geblieben seid: Eure Kraft hat Euch erst verlassen, als das Gefecht vorüber war. Derlei Stärke bei einem Lord Captain ist überaus lobenswert!"

languages.text: « Nous nous faisions un sang d'encre, {n}dit Abélard en vous adressant un léger sourire.{/n} Après vous avoir {mf|vu|vue} {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}prendre part au combat{/d} sur le pont sans la moindre hésitation, je dois avouer que c'est la persistance avec laquelle vous êtes {mf|resté|restée} sur vos deux jambes qui me surprend le plus. Jusqu'à la dernière minute, vous n'avez jamais fléchi. Un tel courage est tout à votre honneur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}rush into the fray{/d} on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous faisions un sang d'encre. » {n}Abélard vous adresse un léger sourire.{/n} « Après vous avoir {mf|vu|vue} prendre part au combat sur le pont sans la moindre hésitation, je dois avouer que c'est la persistance avec laquelle vous êtes {mf|resté|restée} sur vos deux jambes qui me surprend le plus. Jusqu'à la dernière minute, vous n'avez jamais fléchi. Un tel courage est tout à votre honneur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: «Nos ha tenido preocupados durante unas horas». {n}Abelard muestra una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Pero tras ver cómo se {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}lanzaba valerosamente al combate{/d}, lo único que me sorprende es cuánto aguantó de pie: sus fuerzas solo flaquearon cuando terminó la pelea. ¡Esa fortaleza es una inmensa ventaja para un{mf||a} Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}rush into the fray{/d} on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: «Nos ha tenido preocupados durante unas horas». {n}Abelard muestra una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Pero tras ver cómo se lanzaba valerosamente al combate, lo único que me sorprende es cuánto aguantó de pie: sus fuerzas solo flaquearon cuando terminó la pelea. ¡Esa fortaleza es una inmensa ventaja para un{mf||a} Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: "Bizi endişelendirdiniz, ölüp ölüp dirildik." {n}Abelard, hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Lakin güvertedeki {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}çatışmaya korkusuzca atıldığınızı{/d} gördükten sonra şaşırdığım tek şey, o kadar zaman ayakta kalabilmeniz oldu. Gücünüz ancak çatışma sona erdiğinde tükendi. Bir Lord Kaptan'da böylesi dirayet görmek pek takdire şayan!"
languages.original_text: "You had us worried for a few hours there." {n}Abelard offers a thin smile.{/n} "But after witnessing you fearlessly {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentThroughFire}rush into the fray{/d} on deck, the only thing that surprises me is how long you stayed on your feet: your strength only left you once the fighting was all over. Such fortitude is most admirable in a Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "Bizi endişelendirdiniz, ölüp ölüp dirildik." {n}Abelard, yapmacık bir gülümseme sunuyor.{/n} "Lakin güvertedeki çatışmaya korkusuzca atıldığınızı gördükten sonra şaşırdığım tek şey, o kadar zaman ayakta kalabilmeniz oldu. Gücünüz ancak çatışma sona erdiğinde tükendi. Bir Lord Kaptan'da böylesi dirayet görmek pek takdire şayan!"

"Bizi endişelendirdiniz, ölüp ölüp dirildik." {n}Abelard, yapmacık bir gülümseme sunuyor.{/n} "Lakin güvertedeki çatışmaya korkusuzca atıldığınızı gördükten sonra şaşırdığım tek şey, o kadar zaman ayakta kalabilmeniz oldu. Gücünüz ancak çatışma sona erdiğinde tükendi. Bir Lord Kaptan'da böylesi dirayet görmek pek takdire şayan!"
